<style>
    body {
        font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #89f7fe 0%, #66a6ff 100%);
        margin: 0; padding: 30px 15px;
        display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: flex-start;
        min-height: 100vh;
    }
    main {
        background: white;
        padding: 30px 40px;
        border-radius: 15px;
        max-width: 650px;
        width: 100%;
        box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        text-align: center;
    }
    h1 {
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        color: #222;
        font-weight: 700;
    }
    p.intro {
        font-size: 1.1em;
        color: #444;
        line-height: 1.4;
        margin-bottom: 30px;
    }
    p.intro strong {
        color: #1e90ff;
    }
    form {
        margin-bottom: 20px;
    }
    input[type="text"] {
        font-size: 1.3em;
        padding: 8px 10px;
        border-radius: 8px;
        border: 2px solid #bbb;
        transition: border-color 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease;
        text-align: center;
        outline-offset: 3px;
        outline-color: transparent;
    }
    input[type="text"]:focus {
        border-color: #1e90ff;
        outline-color: #a7d1ff;
        background-color: #f0f8ff;
    }
    .input-correct {
        background-color: #4CAF50 !important;
        color: white;
        border-color: #4CAF50 !important;
        font-weight: bold;
        transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
    }
    .input-incorrect {
        background-color: #f44336 !important;
        color: white;
        border-color: #f44336 !important;
        font-weight: bold;
        transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
    }
    button {
        background-color: #1e90ff;
        border: none;
        padding: 12px 25px;
        margin: 0 10px 10px 0;
        border-radius: 8px;
        color: white;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 1em;
        cursor: pointer;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(30, 144, 255, 0.3);
        transition: background-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
    }
    button:hover {
        background-color: #0d6efd;
        box-shadow: 0 6px 14px rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.5);
    }
    button:disabled {
        background-color: #aaa;
        cursor: not-allowed;
        box-shadow: none;
    }
    .message {
        display: inline-block;
        font-weight: 700;
        padding: 10px 20px;
        border-radius: 10px;
        font-size: 1.1em;
        user-select: none;
    }
    .message.success {
        background-color: #d4edda;
        color: #155724;
        border: 2px solid #c3e6cb;
    }
    .message.error {
        background-color: #f8d7da;
        color: #721c24;
        border: 2px solid #f5c6cb;
    }
    .exemple {
        margin-top: 20px;
        background-color: #e0f7fa;
        padding: 15px 20px;
        border-radius: 12px;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 1.1em;
        color: #006064;
    }
    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        main {
            padding: 20px 25px;
        }
        input[type="text"] {
            font-size: 1.1em;
            padding: 6px 8px;
        }
        button {
            width: 100%;
            margin: 8px 0;
        }
    }
</style>
